entry.title: The newer the worse
entry.content: I loves this app so much before, but after new update, I have trouble adjusting photos continuously. After saving one photo, then the program just frozen. And it's just slower than previous version.

The newer the worse

I loves this app so much before, but after new update, I have trouble adjusting photos continuously. After saving one photo, then the program just frozen. And it's just slower than previous version.
